Profile.name: Profile
content: Electrical engineer with experience in electric maintenance as well as transformer and harmonic filter design. Deeply interested in computer science whose systemic approach and problem solving capabilities for both daily and engineering matters motivated an incresingly comprehensive programming, web transfer and software development self teaching.

detail: Personal webpage update and shader programming for 3D rendering.
Pharmaceutical laboratory equipment maintenance, diagnosis and report.

content.institution: Universidad Técnica Federico Santa María, Main Campus, Valparaíso
detail: Transformer and filter design and modeling for a modified high dc current rectifier for simulation and technical analysis.
Factibility and cost evaluation of changing an urban bus fleet to electric buses.
Assigned to the electrical maintenance team and maintenance planning department overseeing hydroelectric plants.

content.institution: Universidad Técnica Federico Santa María, Main Campus, Valparaíso
